SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Ashlei Miller’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope we get to a place where joy and learning co-exist…”

– Ms. Ashlei Miller, Assistant Principal @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/get-to-place-where-joy-learning-co-exist/
